oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Analysis of vortex cores in turbulent flows
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: AGRAWAL, A
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: vortices
jet
vortex core
analytical solution
vorticity
circulation
tangential velocity
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The analytical solution for vorticity, tangential velocity, circulation and pressure inside vortex cores in turbulent flows is presented in this paper. The analysis suggests a linear decrease in vorticity and polynomial variation for other quantities with distance from the vortex centre. The obtained solution is verified against experimental data in the literature.
